actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for an inflation adjustment of the base amounts used in determining the amount of Social Security benefits included in gross income.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amend the Internal Revenue Code to provide, beginning in 2004, for an inflation adjustment of the base amounts used in determining the amount of Social Security benefits included in gross income.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for an inflation adjustment of the base amounts used in determining the amount of Social Security benefits included in gross income.
